purpose: The email announces the eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium, scheduled for June 17-19, 2025, at Polytechnique Montréal, Canada. It invites practitioners and researchers to participate and contribute, particularly through poster presentations. The symposium will focus on the themes of AgentOps and Intelligent Systems, featuring keynotes, sessions, and discussions led by experts in the field. The email also provides details about the program, registration deadlines, and submission guidelines for poster contributions.

evidence_sentences: The eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium will take place at Polytechnique Montréal, Montréal, Canada, from June 17 to June 19, 2025.
We invite practitioners and researchers from all related fields to participate.
The theme of SEMLA 2025 is AgentOps and Intelligent Systems, focusing on two transformative areas.
We accept poster presentations related to any of the SEMLA topics.
